name: One of 500
storyline: In the first episode, which takes place in Capernaum at the Sea of Galilee in 28AD, you play the 15-year-old fisher-boy named Benjamin. Beside the challenges of growing up, meeting your family´s expectations and finding your place in the local society, you will face the big questions of life. While people around you will react very differently to the recent groundbreaking events, as a controversy man from Nazareth shows up.
summary:
One of 500 is a 3rd-person story-adventure game, which is released episodically. The concept envisages 6 Episodes, each of which is split into 5 Chapters.

Discover the authentic world of Jesus from Nazareth and immersively experience the events, meaning and relevance of the Gospel in its historical-cultural context.
